title: How likely is Donald Trump to declare a state of emergency before the 2020 election? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: In Mid-November. If the vote is clearly for the Biden/Harris ticket: How far will Trump, Wm. Barr and other GOP office holders go to try and disrupt the entire election process? To get rid of those mail-in ballots in key swing states. To loudly allege massive fraudulent voting, and mandate a sweeping Justice Dept. investigation into the unverified stories of thousands of ballots thrown into dumpsters. Work to alter the Electoral vote in certain states which feature a Republican Party Governor and GOP-dominated state legislature? Seems unlikely……but.

If he sees this question…probably sometime within the next 24 hours. 2bh he would be more justified in declaring a state of emergency due to COVID (sorry Trump…’The China Virus’) than when he declared a state of emergency at the Southern Border to get funding for his wall (parts of which have easily been scaled and/or been blown over)
